events.message: The client submitted an application for a personal loan to cover upcoming medical expenses and consolidate existing debt.
Loan officer categorized the application under the Personal Loan category after verifying the stated purpose related to medical bills.
Assigned experienced loan officer specialized in personal loans to ensure thorough client support throughout the process.
Completed initial review confirming client’s employment details and verifying intended loan amount aligns with requested purpose.
Requested client to provide recent bank statements, medical bills, and proof of income to support the personal loan application.
Client promptly submitted all requested documentation, including detailed invoices and employment verification letter.
Credit bureau report returned showing a moderate credit score with a few resolved late payments but no recent defaults.
Risk analysis concluded that the loan is moderately risky due to recent minor credit issues but overall manageable with income.
Presented the client with a loan offer outlining interest rates, repayment schedule, and options for early repayment without penalties.
Client responded positively to the offer and asked some clarifying questions about monthly installments and insurance options.
Escalated application to senior credit committee for approval due to the client’s higher loan amount request.
Senior committee approved the loan application after reviewing all documentation and risk assessments in detail.
Funds were disbursed to the client’s account as per the agreed terms to cover medical bills and consolidate debt.
Follow-up call made to client to ensure receipt of funds and satisfaction with loan servicing experience.
Closed the file as the loan process was finalized successfully and client expressed appreciation for smooth handling.
